actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The druid makes two Flowering Quarterstaff or Poison Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Flowering Quarterstaff
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 7 (1d8+3) bludgeoning damage plus 5 (2d4) poison damage.

actions.name: Poison Bolt
actions.desc: _Ranged Spell Attack:_ +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 10 (3d4+3) poison damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc:
The druid casts one of the following spells, using WIS as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13).
At will: druidcraft, speak with animals
3/day each: _entangle_, _cure wounds_, _thunderwave_
2/day each: _barkskin_, _spike growth_
